needs: Seeks part-time 20h/wk Supply Chain Manager roles reporting to a VP of Supply Chain where they can rapidly deliver measurable outcomes such as improved on-time delivery and reduced working capital. Objectives: define signals, run small probes, instrument and scale within the first 90 days. Constraint: limited hours and cross-functional governance.
personality: Empathetic, coaching-led collaborator who prefers concise narrative docs, decision logs, short demos, and lightweight runbooks. They surface unknowns early via probes, favor small observable increments, and use SLOs and dashboards to keep teams accountable. Values ownership, learning, simplicity, and readable processes while balancing data-driven iteration with humane communication.
